roleset.name: cause to be closely affiliated

example.name: not matrimony
example.text: Program trading money managers have gained control over a big chunk of the invested funds in this country, and the pressures on such money managers to produce consistent profits has wedded them to the ability to move rapidly in and out the market that program trading gives them.
example.arg: the pressures on such money managers to produce consistent profits
to the ability to move rapidly in and out the market that program trading gives them

example.name: ergative and objective
example.text: Despite her misgivings, Mary wedded John last week.

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls amalgamate-22.2-3-1-1.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'wed' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.
